hexamod:Float.NAME: Float
hexamod:Float.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL If the hexamod:Active Ghostflame is uncharged, gain [E] . NL hexamod:Advance. NL  Draw 1 card.
hexamod:Float.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL hexamod:Advance. NL Draw 1 card.

hexamod:FastForward.NAME: Fast Forward
hexamod:FastForward.DESCRIPTION: hexamod:Advance. NL Charge the hexamod:Active Ghostflame. NL hexamod:Advance.

hexamod:Rewind.NAME: Rewind
hexamod:Rewind.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: hexamod:Retract. NL Gain [E] . NL Repeat this once.

hexamod:SkipABeat.NAME: Skip a Beat
hexamod:SkipABeat.DESCRIPTION: Charge the hexamod:Active Ghostflame. NL hexamod:Advance. NL Exhaust.
hexamod:SkipABeat.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Charge the hexamod:Active Ghostflame. NL hexamod:Advance.

hexamod:CatchUp.NAME: Catch Up
hexamod:CatchUp.DESCRIPTION: hexamod:Extinguish, then Charge, the Ghostflame preceding the hexamod:Active one.

hexamod:TimeWarp.NAME: Time Warp
hexamod:TimeWarp.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to a random enemy. NL If the first Ghostflame is not hexamod:Active, hexamod:Retract and repeat this.

hexamod:Hexalevel.NAME: Hexa-Level
hexamod:Hexalevel.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, gain !M! hexamod:Enhance.

hexamod:UnlimitedPower.NAME: Unlimited Power
hexamod:UnlimitedPower.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Charge all uncharged Ghostflames in order.

hexamod:GhostOfSpirePast.NAME: Ghost of Spire Past
hexamod:GhostOfSpirePast.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you hexamod:Retract, gain 5 Block and !M! hexamod:Momentary Dexterity.

hexamod:GhostOfSpireFuture.NAME: Ghost of Spire Future
hexamod:GhostOfSpireFuture.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you hexamod:Advance, gain !M! hexamod:Momentary Strength and draw 1 card.

hexamod:GhostOfSpirePresent.NAME: Ghost of Spire Present
hexamod:GhostOfSpirePresent.DESCRIPTION: At the start of each turn, gain !M! Strength. NL Lose this Strength when you hexamod:Advance or hexamod:Retract.

hexamod:ThermalPlanning.NAME: Thermal Planning
hexamod:ThermalPlanning.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you hexamod:Advance or hexamod:Retract this turn, gain !M! hexamod:Momentary hexamod:Enhance.

hexamod:HauntingEcho.NAME: Haunting Echo
hexamod:HauntingEcho.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If the hexamod:Active Ghostflame is Charged, hexamod:Extinguish it and Charge it again.

hexamod:CrushingStance.NAME: Crushing Stance
hexamod:CrushingStance.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage twice. NL Replace the hexamod:Active Ghostflame with a Crushing Ghostflame. NL Exhaust.

hexamod:EmpoweringStance.NAME: Empowering Stance
hexamod:EmpoweringStance.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block and !M! Strength. NL Replace the hexamod:Active Ghostflame with a Bolstering Ghostflame. NL Exhaust.

hexamod:NecessarySacrifice.NAME: Necessary Sacrifice
hexamod:NecessarySacrifice.DESCRIPTION: Choose an Attack or Skill to Exhaust. NL Add a random card of the opposite type into your hand. NL It costs 0 until played.

hexamod:TimeOfNeed.NAME: Time of Need
hexamod:TimeOfNeed.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Add a random Power card into your hand. NL It costs 0 until played. NL Exhaust.
